projectGridLines.title: Undergraduate Intern – AI/ML Ops
projectGridLines.description:
Undergraduate Intern – AI/ML Ops

Join us as an Undergraduate Intern in Bengaluru (Bangalore) to do the best work of your career

and make a profound social impact.

What you’ll achieve

As an Undergraduate Intern, you will work closely with our engineering teams to support the

development, deployment, and monitoring of Homegrown AI Tools. This is an excellent opportunity for

candidates who are passionate about AI/ML and eager to gain hands-on experience in

operationalizing machine learning workflows.

You will:

• Assist in the deployment of machine learning models.

• Monitor and optimize the performance of deployed models.

• Implement best practices for model versioning, reproducibility, and scalability.

• Contribute to the creation of documentation and training materials for ML ops processes.

• Conduct testing and validation of machine learning models to ensure they meet performance

and reliability standards.

• Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to model deployment and performance.

• Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI/ML Ops to continuously enhance the

capabilities and performance of the tool.

Take the first step towards your dream career

Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are

looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements

• Ongoing undergraduate course work in the domain of Computer Science Engineering and

associated fields

• Excellent communication and presentation skills

• Critical thinking and problem-solving skills

• Ability to prioritize and maintain organization in day-to-day activities

Desirable Requirements

• Knowledge of Dell Technologies products and services portfolio

• Data management skills
